author: fitz
msg: Adding advertisement for a company to the www.apache.org homepage
without approval from fundraising is inappropriate.
Removing Apache newsletter section for time being as the most current
newsletter is rather stale (Oct 15th) to be considered newsworthy.
This is being done with the approval of at least 3 other ASF
